mainDescription: Dot Internet started its operation in the year 2005 with the commitment of quality internet service at an affordable price. Over time, our team has developed and introduced many new technologies to meet the requirement of the new millennium. We are one of the top growing ISP Providers in Dhaka, hoping to do much better in the broadband industry with great service.

missionVision.desc: Our mission works to make Quality Internet and Solutions reachable for all user ranges.
Be the Top Internet and solutions provider of Bangladesh with QOS (Quality of Service).
